name: Reflection Reverie
description:
Enter the dream world in this about five minutes long, unfinished gaming experience!

Features:

Six unique rooms to explore!

The same enemy in every encounter!

Turn-based battles with a little bit of real time action for FLAVOR!

Two unique healing items to use in your battles!

STUNNING retro graphics in unparalleled HD resolutions reaching 144p!

Four beautiful, greenscale colors! That's way more than two!

A save system that only saves your current location! Pick up right where you left off from the only save point in the game!

Full source code both here and on Gitlab! Can't wait for more Reflection Reverie content? Make your own! For me! Unpaid! Glorious!

On a serious note, this game is scuffed as heck, but I hope that someone out there enjoys it. I at least enjoyed making it so far.
